nodes.short_description:
Combat + Cardio + VR = Fight Fit VR

Découvrez le jeu ultime de fitness et de combat en réalité virtuelle, conçu pour vous motiver à brûler des calories tout en terrassant vos adversaires !

Saurez‑vous tenir 10 rounds d’un combat acharné contre des styles variés, des ennemis redoutables et des défis de compétence ?
Avez‑vous la technique ? Avez‑vous la vitesse ? Avez‑vous le rythme… cardiaque ???

Combat + Cardio + VR = Fight Fit VR

Erlebe das ultimative VR‑Fitness‑Kampfspiel, das dich motiviert, Kalorien zu verbrennen und Gegner zu besiegen! Hältst du 10 harte Runden gegen verschiedene Kampfstile, Gegner und Herausforderungen durch? Hast du die Technik? Hast du die Geschwindigkeit? Hast du den Herz…schlag???

Combat + Cardio + VR = Fight Fit VR

Vivi l’ultimo gioco di fitness e combattimento in realtà virtuale, che ti motiva a bruciare calorie mentre abbatti i nemici! Riesci a resistere a 10 round di duro combattimento contro stili diversi, avversari e sfide di abilità? Hai la tecnica? Hai la velocità? Hai il battito… cardiaco???

Combat + Cardio + VR = Fight Fit VR

Experience the ultimate virtual reality fitness fighting game that will motivate you to lose calories whilst dropping bad guys!  

Can you last 10 rounds of grueling combat against multiple fight styles, enemies and skill challenges?  Do you have the skill? Do you have the speed?  Do you have the heart...rate???

Combat + Cardio + VR = Fight Fit VR

究極のVRフィットネス格闘ゲームを体験しよう。カロリーを燃やしながら敵を倒す爽快感！10ラウンドの過酷な戦いに耐えられるか？多様なスタイル、敵、スキルチャレンジが待ち受ける。技はあるか？スピードはあるか？心臓の鼓動…は十分か???

Combat + Cardio + VR = Fight Fit VR

Vive el juego definitivo de fitness y combate en realidad virtual, que te motiva a quemar calorías mientras derrotas enemigos. ¿Podrás resistir 10 rondas de duro combate contra distintos estilos, rivales y desafíos de habilidad? ¿Tienes la técnica? ¿La velocidad? ¿El ritmo… cardíaco???

nodes.long_description:
# **Get Ready to Sweat, Punch, and Level Up Your Fitness!**

Fight Fit VR is not just a fighting game—it’s a fitness fighting game. We’ve merged the adrenaline-pumping mechanics of fighting games with a fitness twist, creating an experience that will leave you breathless and craving more.

## **Key Features**
**Dynamic Combat:** Enemies keep coming, and your heart rate keeps soaring. Dodge and punch your way through waves of opponents. The more enemies you defeat, the harder they become.

**Variety Galore:** Face off against different fight styles, body types, and skill challenges. Adapt, strategize, and stay engaged as you progress.

**Customization Options:** Whether you’re a fitness newbie or a seasoned athlete, we’ve got you covered. Customize your training regimen, from light warm-ups to intense sessions. Build your fitness at your own pace.

**Score and Compete:** Our balanced scoring system lets you track your progress and compare scores with friends and other players. Are you the ultimate fitness warrior?

**Self-Defense Mastery:** Learn real-world self-defense techniques while having a blast. Dodge, counter and  punch like a pro—all in the safety of virtual reality.


## **Why Choose Fight Fit VR?**
**Fun Meets Fitness:** Say goodbye to boring workouts. Fight Fit VR turns exercise into play time.

**Heart-Pounding Action:** Feel the rush as you unleash combos, counter and dodge attacks.
nodes.short_description:
Combat + Cardio + VR = Fight Fit VR

Experience the ultimate virtual reality fitness fighting game that will motivate you to lose calories whilst dropping bad guys!  

Can you last 10 rounds of grueling combat against multiple fight styles, enemies and skill challenges?  Do you have the skill? Do you have the speed?  Do you have the heart...rate???

nodes.change_log:
Made the play button more obvious in the Fight menu

Added a P on enemy forehead to signify a successful parry

Fixed some bugs

Added mini story

Added tutorial pop ups

Added ability to start from last failed round

Added attack highlighting and slowed down enemy counters

Added enemy attacking limb highlighting

Slowed down enemy counter attack

Tweaked scoring system

Fixed a punch reaction bug

Fixed punch scoring in strike mode
fixed some bugs and reduced strike punch threshold to make it easier

Fight Fit VR – Final Major Early Access Update/n
/n
This update marks the final major milestone before Fight Fit VR comes out of Early Access!/n
/n
Highlights:/n
- Enemy AI improvements with new Poise setting/n
- Two new game modes: Strike and Parry/n
- Scoring system amended for better balance/n
- Localisation added for 6 languages/n
- Enemy character models redesigned/n
- Player now has a visible avatar/n
- LIV support integrated for content creators/n
- Expanded offline mode support/n
- Numerous bug fixes and performance improvements/n
/n
Thank you for supporting Fight Fit VR during Early Access - Please do let me know at fightfitvr@gmail.com if you encounter any bugs as I would like to come out of early access before Christmas eve!
